sentences.en: Farmers responded to low pork prices last year by breeding fewer pigs, some of which have since fallen victim to porcine diarrhoea.
sentences.cn: 去年的猪肉价格低，农民养猪的少，加之部分猪的数量由于腹泻病的出现而下降。

sentences.en: Genic transcriptome pertinent to porcine muscle and adipose also came into study.
sentences.cn: 猪肌肉和脂肪相关基因转录谱的研究亦初步展开.

sentences.en: He is a bald porcine old man.
sentences.cn: 他是个长得像猪一样的秃头老男人。

sentences.en: Here we report the isolation and characterization of stem cells from porcine skin.
sentences.cn: 该研究自猪皮肤中,分离干细胞并检测其特性.

sentences.en: In more recent years, at least judging from a search of the Post archives, cads, thugs, molesters, and swindlers have most frequently elicited what the paper might call the porcine pejorative.
sentences.cn: 在最近的这些年里，至少从对档案的数据库可以判断出，新闻报纸上更会经常使用像猪一样的这个轻蔑的词来指代无赖，恶棍，猥亵犯，骗子这类人。

sentences.en: It also became apparent that the new virus contains bits and pieces derived from avian and human strains of influenza, as well as porcine ones, further muddying its origins.
sentences.cn: 后来也发现这种新病毒混合了鸡鸭的禽流感、人类的流行感冒、加上一些类似于猪的病毒，使新型流感的起源更加扑朔迷离。

sentences.en: Objective : To study the firbronectin purification method from porcine plasma to obtain high purity purified product.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究猪血浆中纤维结合蛋白的分离纯化方法,得到高纯度、高活性的目标蛋白.

sentences.en: Objective A porcine model with basal ganglia hemorrhage has been established and evaluated.
sentences.cn: 目的:建立稳定的猪脑基底核出血模型.

sentences.en: Objective To develop a PCR method for the determination of porcine parvovirus ( PPV ).
sentences.cn: 目的建立猪细小病毒 ( PPV ) PCR检测方法.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the effect of plasma radiofrequency at low temperature on porcine lingua.
sentences.cn: 目的研究低温等离子射频技术对组织的影响及恢复情况.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo establish the serological method for detection of porcine parvovirus ( PPV ).
sentences.cn: 目的建立猪细小病毒血清学检测方法.

sentences.en: Pig - cell transplants are still a work in progress, and porcine organ transplants are only an idea.
sentences.cn: 猪细胞移植仍是处于进展中的工作, 而且猪器官移植还只是一种设想.

sentences.en: Purpose To identify recombinant human insulin and porcine insulin.
sentences.cn: 目的鉴别猪胰岛素与重组人胰岛素.

sentences.en: The disease is also known as porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome.
sentences.cn: 该疾病也称为猪繁殖和呼吸综合症.

sentences.en: The FasL + chondrocytes mixed with Pluronic F 127 were injected subcutaneously into abdomen wall in allogenic porcine.
sentences.cn: 取FasL+的软骨细胞与可注射性生物材料PluronicF127混合,注射于同种异体猪的腹壁皮下.

sentences.en: The immobilization of porcine pancreas lipase on active carbon by absorption has been studied.
sentences.cn: 初步研究了以活性炭为载体的猪胰脂酶吸附固定.

sentences.en: The scientific name is porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome.
sentences.cn: 学名是生殖和呼吸综合症.

sentences.en: This paper has studied the extraction of collagen from porcine skin by trypsin, papain and pepsin.
sentences.cn: 研究了用胰酶 、 木瓜蛋白酶和胃蛋白酶从猪皮中提取胶原蛋白.

trans.tran_en: looking like or relating to pigs
